headline: The weekly meetups turning isolated doctors into real friendships.
valueProposition: Weekly curated small group meetups with matched physicians
subheadline: No swiping. No networking. No awkward small talk.
subheadline2: We match you with 3–4 verified doctors in your city — so you just show up.
subheadlineBold: because the best friendships start with common ground.
ctaMicroCopy: No spam · Every doctor is verified
limitedSpotsDesc: Only <1>24 doctors</1> per weekend in Berlin.
ctaTitle: Find Doctors You Actually Want to Meet
ctaSubtext: Every week, small groups of verified doctors meet in real life. No swiping. No awkward chats. Just real connections.
ctaClosingQuote: I met two of my closest friends through BeyondRounds. We still meet every month.
problemTitle: Being a doctor can feel lonely — even when you're surrounded by people.
problemDesc: Medicine is demanding. Long hours, rotating hospitals, new cities, and little time to build real friendships.
howSubtitle: Finding meaningful friendships shouldn't be left to chance. Here's how we make it happen.
step1Desc: Quick verification to keep the community trusted.
step4Desc: Simple activity: brunch, coffee, walk, or sport.
howCTANote: Only 24 spots per weekend in Berlin.
valueTitle: Built around how real friendships actually form
valueCheck3: Matched by city, interests, and availability
valueTagline: We remove the friction. You keep the fun.
weekendSubtitle: Tell us which day works for you. We'll notify you when your spot is confirmed.
weekendCapacity: Each weekend is limited to 24 spots across all groups.
foundingSubtitle: Only <1>100 doctors</1> will ever get founding access.
foundingBenefit2: Free re-match if your first meetup doesn't happen (no-shows / coordination issues)
foundingBenefit4: Early access when new cities open
foundingScarcity: Once 100 are filled, this closes permanently.
testimonialQuote1: I met two of my closest friends through BeyondRounds. We still meet every month.
testimonialQuote2: Moving to Berlin was isolating until BeyondRounds matched me with amazing people who actually get it.
testimonialQuote3: It felt like meeting old friends for the first time. No pretense, just genuine connection.
testimonialCTANote: Verified doctors only. Small groups. Every weekend.
testimonialQuote: I finally found colleagues here who really get me.
testimonialQuote2Alt: BeyondRounds matched me with people I actually want to grab coffee with.
faq1A: BeyondRounds is exclusively for licensed physicians in Berlin. Whether you're a resident, attending, or in private practice — if you hold a medical license and want genuine friendships outside the hospital, this is for you.
faq2A: We match based on city, shared interests, and weekend availability. Groups are intentionally small (3–4 doctors) so every conversation feels personal, not crowded.
faq3Q: What happens after I choose Friday/Sat/Sun?
faq3A: You'll enter a short registration flow to confirm your details and preferences. Once confirmed, you'll receive your group match and meetup details before the weekend.
faq4A: We take commitment seriously. Founding members receive a free re-match if their first meetup is affected by a no-show. We also send reminders and confirmations to minimize this.
faq5A: Neither. BeyondRounds is designed purely for friendship. No romantic matching, no business-card exchanges. Just real, relaxed social connection between doctors who want a life outside medicine.
faq6A: During registration, we verify your medical credentials to ensure every member is a licensed physician. This keeps the community trusted and the conversations authentic.
faq7A: We're launching in Berlin first. Additional cities will open based on demand — founding members get early access when new locations go live.
faqCTANote: 24 spots per weekend. Founding access limited to 100 doctors.
finalCTATitle: Reserve a spot for this weekend.
pricingTitle: One match. One weekend. See for yourself.
pricingSubtitle: No hidden fees. No long-term contracts. Start with a single group match.
plan1Desc: One curated group match for one weekend. Perfect for trying it out.
plan2Desc: A new curated group every week. Build real friendships over time.
plan3Desc: Three months of weekly group matches. Enough time to find your people.
plan4Desc: A full year of curated matches. For doctors serious about building real friendships.
planFeat2: Private group chat with ice-breaker prompts
planFeat4: Free re-match if your first meetup is affected by a no-show
guarantee30Desc: If you haven't had at least 2 real meetups in your first 30 days, we'll refund you — no questions asked.
guarantee30Note: Email billing@beyondrounds.app within 30 days. Refunds processed in 5–7 business days.
